title: Issues with refine labels not being saved
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
Ubuntu 16.04 and DeepLabCut version 2.0.5

Please state your operating system, env, and which version of DeepLabCut you are using.
Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut 2.0.5

Please complete the following information about your system:

OS: Ubuntu 16.04
DeepLabCut Version 2.0.5
Browser Firefox


**Describe the problem**
Refined labels are not being saved, so after extracting outliers, doing refine labels and merging dataset if i check labels it appears that changes made by me are not being saved.
This is an example of an outlier frame that was extracted using default values

![img08283labeled](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49492309/82126980-6be40300-977e-11ea-8cc6-6cf8a2de31c5.png)

After using refine labels in which i moved last three dots on tail to the center point in the tail and merged data set. then i used check label that gave me this with no changes at all
![img08283](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49492309/82127029-b4032580-977e-11ea-928d-ff252ffa557f.png)
 
**How to Reproduce the problem**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Don't know how this can be reproduce i just follow the steps involved in deeplabcut procedure.
Trained my network with 1030000 iterations ,ResNet 101
Analysed my videos extracted outliers, refined labels merge dataset and check labels
